headline: Assessing Allstate (ALL) Valuation After Recent Short Term Share Price Weakness
summary: Why Allstate Is On Investors’ Radar Today Allstate (ALL) is back in focus after a recent share price move that contrasts with its longer term performance. The stock is up over the past year but lower over the past month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Allstate. The recent 1 day share price return of 0.66% to around $193.55 contrasts with a 30 day share price return decline of 5.59%.
